trans-unit.source: Players must leave game in progress as it is and use the cards left in their libraries as decks with which to play a subgame of Magic. When subgame is over, players shuffle these cards, return them to libraries, and resume game in progress, with any loser of subgame halving his or her remaining life points, rounding down. Effects that prevent damage may not be used to counter this loss of life. The subgame has no ante; using less than forty cards may be necessary.
trans-unit.target: Players must leave game in progress as it is and use the cards left in their libraries as decks with which to play a subgame of Magic. When subgame is over, players shuffle these cards, return them to libraries, and resume game in progress, with any loser of subgame halving his or her remaining life points, rounding down. Effects that prevent damage may not be used to counter this loss of life. The subgame has no ante; using less than forty cards may be necessary.

trans-unit.target: "When elephants fight it is the grass that suffers." —Kikuyu Proverb

trans-unit.target: "When elephants fight it is the grass that suffers." —Kikuyu Proverb

trans-unit.resname: ARN·18 | Old Man of the Sea | Card Name
ARN·18 | Old Man of the Sea | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Tap to gain control of a creature with power no greater than Old Man's power. If Old Man becomes untapped, you lose control of this creature; you may choose not to untap Old Man as normal. You also lose control of the creature if Old Man dies or if the creature's power becomes greater than Old Man's.
trans-unit.target: Tap to gain control of a creature with power no greater than Old Man's power. If Old Man becomes untapped, you lose control of this creature; you may choose not to untap Old Man as normal. You also lose control of the creature if Old Man dies or if the creature's power becomes greater than Old Man's.

trans-unit.source: Flying During your upkeep, you must choose one of your own lands and destroy it. If you destroy an island in this manner, Serendib Djinn does 3 damage to you. Serendib Djinn is destroyed immediately if at any time you have no land in play.

trans-unit.source: As long as Guardian Beast is untapped, your non-creature artifacts cannot be further enchanted, destroyed, or taken under someone else's control. If something occurs that would destroy the Guardian Beast and artifacts simultaneously, the Guardian Beast is destroyed but your artifacts are not. If an artifact is enchanted or stolen while Guardian Beast is tapped, it remains so when Guardian Beast becomes untapped.

If an artifact is enchanted or stolen while Guardian Beast is tapped, it remains so when Guardian Beast becomes untapped.

trans-unit.source: Select a creature in play when Oubliette is cast. That creature is considered out of play as long as Oubliette is in play. Hence the creature cannot be the target of spells and cannot receive damage, use special powers, attack, or defend. All counters and enchantments on the creature remain but are also out of play. If Oubliette is removed, creature returns to play tapped.

ARN·58 | Bottle of Suleiman | Card Text
trans-unit.source: o4: Flip a coin, with opponent calling heads or tails while coin is in the air. If the flip ends up in opponent's favor, Bottle of Suleiman does 5 damage to you. Otherwise, a 5/5 flying Djinn immediately comes into play on your side. Use a counter to represent Djinn. Djinn is treated exactly like a normal artifact creature except that if it leaves play it is removed from the game entirely. No matter how the flip turns out, Bottle of Suleiman is discarded after use.

Djinn is treated exactly like a normal artifact creature except that if it leaves play it is removed from the game entirely. No matter how the flip turns out, Bottle of Suleiman is discarded after use.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·68 | Ring of Ma'rûf | Card Name
ARN·68 | Ring of Ma'rûf | Card Text
trans-unit.source: o5: Instead of drawing a card from the top of your library, select one of your cards from outside the game. This card can be any card you have that you're not using in your deck or that for some reason has left the game. Ring of Ma'rûf is removed from the game entirely after use.
trans-unit.target: o5: Instead of drawing a card from the top of your library, select one of your cards from outside the game. This card can be any card you have that you're not using in your deck or that for some reason has left the game. Ring of Ma'rûf is removed from the game entirely after use.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·69 | Sandals of Abdallah | Card Name
ARN·69 | Sandals of Abdallah | Card Text
trans-unit.source: o2: Gives one creature islandwalk ability until end of turn. If that creature is destroyed before end of turn, so are Sandals.
trans-unit.target: o2: Gives one creature islandwalk ability until end of turn. If that creature is destroyed before end of turn, so are Sandals.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·70 | Bazaar of Baghdad | Card Name
ARN·70 | Bazaar of Baghdad | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Tap to take two cards from your library, after which you must immediately discard three from your hand to your graveyard. If you don't have three or more cards in your hand, discard your whole hand. No spells may be cast between drawing and discarding cards.
trans-unit.target: Tap to take two cards from your library, after which you must immediately discard three from your hand to your graveyard. If you don't have three or more cards in your hand, discard your whole hand. No spells may be cast between drawing and discarding cards.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·71 | City of Brass | Card Name
ARN·71 | City of Brass | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Tap to add 1 mana of any color to your mana pool. You suffer 1 damage whenever City of Brass becomes tapped.
trans-unit.target: Tap to add 1 mana of any color to your mana pool. You suffer 1 damage whenever City of Brass becomes tapped.

trans-unit.source: Tap to add 1 colorless mana to your mana pool or do 1 damage to an attacking creature after it deals its damage.
trans-unit.target: Tap to add 1 colorless mana to your mana pool or do 1 damage to an attacking creature after it deals its damage.

trans-unit.source: Tap to sacrifice one of your creatures in exchange for a number of life points equal to its toughness. Note that this ability may be used after blocking has been declared.
trans-unit.target: Tap to sacrifice one of your creatures in exchange for a number of life points equal to its toughness. Note that this ability may be used after blocking has been declared.

trans-unit.source: Tap to add 1 colorless mana to your mana pool or regenerate an Elephant or Mammoth.
trans-unit.target: Tap to add 1 colorless mana to your mana pool or regenerate an Elephant or Mammoth.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·75 | Island of Wak-Wak | Card Name
ARN·75 | Island of Wak-Wak | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Tap to reduce target flying creature's power to 0.
trans-unit.target: Tap to reduce target flying creature's power to 0.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·75 | Island of Wak-Wak | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Isle of Wak-Wak, home to a tribe of winged folk, is named for a peculiar fruit that grows there. The fruit looks like a woman's head, and when ripe speaks the word "Wak."
trans-unit.target: The Isle of Wak-Wak, home to a tribe of winged folk, is named for a peculiar fruit that grows there. The fruit looks like a woman's head, and when ripe speaks the word "Wak."

trans-unit.resname: ARN·76 | Library of Alexandria | Card Name
ARN·76 | Library of Alexandria | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Tap to add 1 colorless mana to your mana pool or draw a card from your library; you may use the card-drawing ability only if you have exactly seven cards in your hand.
trans-unit.target: Tap to add 1 colorless mana to your mana pool or draw a card from your library; you may use the card-drawing ability only if you have exactly seven cards in your hand.

trans-unit.source: Tap to add o R to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: Tap to add o R to your mana pool.

trans-unit.source: Tap to prevent 1 damage to any creature.
trans-unit.target: Tap to prevent 1 damage to any creature.
